message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its value and the benefits it provides, I believe we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for the product. This offer allows me to ensure a fair return on my investment while providing you with a competitive advantage in your endeavors. I look forward to your response and the opportunity to discuss this further.
